links.title: U.S. Senate bill could give Tesla, GM electric car tax credit boost
links.description: Tesla Inc and General Motors Co, which have lobbied Congress to lift a cap on electric vehicles eligible for a $7,500 tax credit, could get their way for up to four years under a new proposal from a Republican senator.

links.title: Water Use in Fracking Soars - Exceeding Rise in Fossil Fuels Produced, Study Says
links.description: As the fracking boom matures, the drilling industry's use of water and other fluids to produce oil and natural gas has grown dramatically in the past several years, outstripping the growth of the fossil fuels it produces.

links.title: A Field Guide To Potential Securities Violations By Tesla's Foes - In Depth
links.description: A great deal of attention has been recently placed on the conflict between Elon Musk and the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) regarding certain tweets by the CEO of Tesla. What is not clear to many, however, is the extraordinary number of potential securities violations that are happening regularly with regards to Tesla's stock (NASDAQ: TSLA) that are the work of individuals opposing Tesla's success.
